about_the_game:
Use the abilities of the terrifyingly cute guests,
Escape from the mysterious "Gregory House" hotel...


"The Gregory Horror Show" is a horror adventure game that was previously produced and distributed for feature phones, based on the popular 3DCG horror comedy that was broadcast on CS (Kids Station) and other stations.

Players aim to escape from the hotel ``Gregory House'' by making full use of the special ability ``Soul Exchange,'' which allows them to possess characters, and by borrowing the abilities of guests to solve mysteries.
The game also includes many mini-games featuring unique characters.
The ending changes depending on the player's choices and actions. Furthermore, there will be more bonus game stages after clearing the game, so you can enjoy it over and over again.
Please enjoy hotel life with a little scary but cute characters...

■ About G-MODE Archives
The G-MODE Archives is a reissue project that faithfully recreates old feature phone games as they were back then.

In order to enjoy the app as it was back then, the web-connected menu, buttons, and keys have been transplanted, but some of them may not work.
For more information on the Steam version, press START button and see the "How to play" in the PAUSE menu.
